response.response:
{
  "copyright": "The Digital Image Archive of Medieval Music",
  "licences": [
    "Website Access Agreement",
    "License to Digitise and Archive Primary Sources",
    "Licence to deliver images via the DIAMM website portal"
  ],
  "terms and conditions": [
    "The images are not owned by DIAMM, but are available online through us thanks to rights agreements with the owning institutions, and this rights agreement prohibits the free download of images.",
    "The images may only be used for research or non-commercial reasons.",
    "For publications, a reproduction rights fee may be required, although this is usually waived for academic (i.e. non-profit) publications.",
    "If you wish to obtain copies of images, you need to contact the library that owns them to obtain permission and specify the size/quality of the image you want.",
    "There is currently no charge for adding digital images to the DIAMM collection, but for large collections, additional cost may be incurred.",
    "DIAMM has no interest in obtaining rights to images; the images archived by the Project are owned by the institutions who own the original document.",
    "Users wishing to access images need to register and agree to the Website Access Agreement.",
    "DIAMM licences are strictly honoured and enforced."
  ]
}
